version_description:
- Fix a critical bug that will cause user unable to reply comments in his own profile page
- Message deletion fully supported
- Prolonged display time of in-app notification

We are excited to present you Blued 1.8.1 ! In this version，
Over

We are excited to present you Blued 1.9.0 ! In this version，
- Brand-new profile look. Completely redesigned interface.
- Open access of group creation to everyone.
- Introducing new face authentication system.

- Fix the bug
We are excited to present you Blued 1.9.0 ! In this version，
- Brand-new profile look. Completely redesigned interface.
- Open access of group creation to everyone.
- Introducing new face authentication system.

Blued 2.0 (beta) — The beginning of a new chapter for gay social.

Awesome social features.
- Message request! New message requests are now separate from your existing convos in your inbox.
- New browse look! See profiles by distance, tr

Blued 2.0 (beta) — The beginning of a new chapter for gay social.

Awesome social features.
- Message request! New message requests are now separate from your existing convos in your inbox.
- New browse look! See profiles by distance, tr

- Optimized registration process! We adopted Account Kit provided by Facebook. Signing up Blued has never been this easier and faster!
- Share your Photo Lab results with screenshot to your Facebook and Twitter friends!
- New layout for live streams

- Optimized registration process! We adopted Account Kit provided by Facebook. Signing up Blued has never been this easier and faster!
- Share your Photo Lab results with screenshot to your Facebook and Twitter friends!
- New layout for live streams

Introducing Blued 2.1:
Heaps of content flying your way, richer than ever before, and even faster and easier to share on Blued!
- Who likes scary URLs? Blued now supports rich weblink sharing, both on your timeline and in your private conversations.

Introducing Blued 2.2
- Brand new ‘Explore’ channel. Now Blued becomes even smarter to present you what you’re interested in.
- Notification Center. Check the activity that matters to you, all in one place. You won’t miss anyone any more.

Introducing Blued Pride Special Edition!
** Account Deletion **
We’re sad to see you go, but from now on every Blued user gets the complete freedom to delete their own account. Joining or leaving, we believe the choice is all yours and this time we

Here comes our latest big update with significant improvements. Socializing in Blued becomes more versatile and convenient than ever.
- Completely overhauled posting experience.
Insert photos, videos, location tags, hashtags, web links, mention anyo

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Moreover, the new version is compatible with iOS 11.

By popular demand, our app's latest version now offers Private Photos & Private Live!
- Private Photos: added privacy and security by allowing you to restrict access to some of your photos
- Private Live: Want to do Live broadcasts exclusivel

By popular demand, our app's latest version now offers Private Photos & Private Live!
- Private Photos: added privacy and security by allowing you to restrict access to some of your photos
- Private Live: Want to do Live broadcasts exclusivel

- Sign up and log in via brand new “Blued ID”;
- Brand new 1V1 video call function makes him closer to you;
- Mask for Live Hosts;
- Fashion filter for LIVE streaming, setting your own filter curves;
- User can use Google account to log-in now

- Sign up and log in via brand new “Blued ID”;
- Brand new 1V1 video call function makes him closer to you;
- Mask for Live Hosts;
- Fashion filter for LIVE streaming, setting your own filter curves;
- User can use Google account to log-in now

- Fixed an issue where messages could not be sent or received;
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

- Nearby: Add fresh faces gallery, discover new faces around you;
- Message: Regret sending something out without thinking? You can recall it in 1 hour;
- Public LIVE: Update the HIT LIVE & Countries list in LIVE streaming;

2.7.0:
- Wealth Level: Special for supporters in Live room, enjoy the privileges of each level;
- Video Call: Upgrade to a mini-video model, you can explore nearby pages and message box while calling;
- Security Update: Link your email to your B

2.7.2:
- Live Streaming performance improved, stability enhanced;
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

Recent Updates:
- Wealth Level: Special for supporters in Live room, enjoy the privileges of each level;
- Video Call: Upgrade to a m

2.7.4 版：
- 全新[闪聊]功能：系统匹配视频聊天对象，30秒拓展你的交际圈；
- 优化关注列表排序、个人资料页展示；
- 优化连线观众展示；
- 优化直播间，提升稳定性；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

近期更新：
- 独家财富等级：氪金用户独家专属，尊享等级特权与荣耀；
- 视频通话优化：小窗通话功能全新上线，边刷动态边聊天，探索精彩两不误；
- 安全升级：绑定邮箱，找回密码，以备不时之需。

2.7.5 版：
- 全新[闪聊]功能：系统匹配视频聊天对象，30秒拓展你的交际圈；
- 优化关注列表排序、个人资料页展示；
- 优化连线观众展示；
- 优化直播间，提升稳定性；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

近期更新：
- 独家财富等级：氪金用户独家专属，尊享等级特权与荣耀；
- 视频通话优化：小窗通话功能全新上线，边刷动态边聊天，探索精彩两不误；
- 安全升级：绑定邮箱，找回密码，以备不时之需。

- [我的账户]：全新账户管理，实现多种方式登录；
- [我的钱包]：更方便地管理你在 Blued 的礼物及余额；
- [个人资料页]：左右滑动，可以查看列表内的其他用户；
- [新面孔] 全面升级：在列表中一并查看刚到你附近的用户；
- [阅后即焚] 正式回归，放下包袱，尽情畅聊；
- 优化直播间，提升稳定性；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

2.7.8 版：
- 闪聊：新增更多面具，各类风格，尽情选择；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

近期更新：
- [阅后即焚]：阅后即焚正式回归，放下包袱，尽情畅聊；
- [消息撤回]：支持聊天内容1小时内撤回，发错消息也不怕；
- [新面孔]：在列表中一并查看刚到你附近的用户；
- [我的账户]：全新账户管理，实现多种方式登录；
- [我的钱包]：更方便地管理你在 Blued 的礼物及余额。

2.7.9 Version:
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

Recent Updates:
- [Video Match]: Add 8 masks with all kinds of designs;
- [Timer]: Your pictures and blinks can be deleted automatically after 5 secs;
- [Message Recall]: Regret havi

‐Bluedプレミアムがリリース：もっと便利、プライバシー重視、面白い
‐バグ修正と一部機能改善

1. You can sending gifts with Auto-Strike now.The numbers will jump out and add up, and the effect is clear at a glance!
2. Bug fixed and other improvements.

- Beans Battle: Warhorn has been blown, warpaint has been drawn. It's time to fight!
- Popularity Battle: Win the Popularity Battle by getting the most daggers and cannons. You can defy the power of the rich and famous!

- Bug fixed and other improvements.
